response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your high standards. This product, valued at $12,000 to you, offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that I believe will significantly enhance your experience. I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $11,500. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate.
